titleStmt.title: Certain additions to the booke of gunnery, with a supply of fire-workes all done by the former author Thomas Smith ... ; both pleasant and profitable.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Thomas, fl. 1600-1627.

titleStmt.title: Certain additions to the booke of gunnery, with a supply of fire-workes all done by the former author Thomas Smith ... ; both pleasant and profitable.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Thomas, fl. 1600-1627.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.L. and are to be sold by R. Dawlman, in Fleet-street neere the great Conduit,

notesStmt.note: Pages 68, 69, and 72 misnumbered as 72, 73, and 76 respectively.
Imperfect: has print show-through and is torn, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge) Library.
With: The art of gunnery ... / compiled by Thomas Smith. London : Printed for William Ponsonby, 1600 (identified as STC 22855+ and as STC 22855.5).

person.persName: Smith, Thomas, souldier of Barwick upon Tweed.
